ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY

block.text: PAULUN TIMOTEYӘ İKINCI MӘKTUBU

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY CHP 1
Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ through the will of God, according to the promise of the life which is in Christ Jesus,

block.text: Mәsih İsada olan hәyat vәdinә görә Allahın iradәsi ilә Mәsih İsanın hәvarisi mәn Pauldan

ReferenceBlocks.text: to Timothy, my beloved child: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

block.text: mәnә sevimli oğul olan Timoteyә salam! Ata Allahdan vә Rәbbimiz Mәsih İsadan sәnә lütf, mәrhәmәt vә sülh olsun!

ReferenceBlocks.text: I thank God, whom I serve as my forefathers did, with a pure conscience. How unceasing is my memory of you in my petitions, night and day.

block.text: Durmadan, gecә-gündüz dualarımda sәni yada saldığım zaman ata-babalarım kimi tәmiz vicdanla ibadәt etdiyim Allaha şükür edirәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When I remember your tears, I long to see you, that I may be filled with joy;

block.text: Sәnin göz yaşlarını xatırlayaraq sәni görmәyә hәsrәt çәkirәm ki, sevinclә dolum.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I remember the sincere faith that is in you; which lived first in your grandmother Lois, and your mother Eunice, and, I am persuaded, it is in you also.

block.text: Sәndәki riyasız imanı yadıma salıram. Әvvәlcә nәnәn Lois vә anan Evnikinin saxladığı bu imanı, әminәm ki, sәn dә saxlayırsan.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause, I remind you that you should stir up the gift of God which is in you through the laying on of my hands.

block.text: Bu sәbәbdәn sәnin üzәrinә әl qoymağımla Allahın sәnә verdiyi әnamı alovlandırmağını xatırladıram.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For God didn't give us a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and self-control.

block.text: Çünki Allah bizә qorxaqlıq ruhu deyil, güc, mәhәbbәt vә ağıllı-kamallı olmaq ruhu vermişdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore don't be ashamed of the testimony of our Lord, nor of me his prisoner; but endure hardship for the Good News according to the power of God.

block.text: Buna görә Rәbbimiz barәdә şәhadәt etmәkdәn vә Onun uğrunda mәhbus olan mәndәn utanma. Allahın gücü ilә Müjdә uğrunda mәnimlә birlikdә әzaba qatlaş.

ReferenceBlocks.text: He is the one who saved us and called us with a holy calling, not according to our works, but according to his own purpose and grace, which was given to us in Christ Jesus before times eternal.

block.text: Allah bizi әmәllәrimizә görә deyil, öz mәqsәdinә vә lütfünә görә xilas edib müqәddәs olmağa çağırdı. Zaman başlamazdan әvvәl o lütf bizә Mәsih İsada verilmişdi,

ReferenceBlocks.text: It has been revealed to us now by the appearing of our Savior, Christ Jesus. He abolished death, and brought life and immortality to light through the Good News.

block.text: indi isә Xilaskarımız Mәsih İsanın zühuru ilә üzә çıxdı. O, ölümü yox etdi, Müjdә vasitәsilә hәyatı vә ölmәzliyi aşkar etdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this, I was appointed as a preacher, an apostle, and a teacher of the Gentiles.

block.text: Mәn bu Müjdә üçün vaiz, hәvari vә müәllim tәyin olundum.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For this cause I also suffer these things. Yet I am not ashamed, for I know him whom I have believed. I am persuaded that he is able to guard that which I have committed to him against that day.

block.text: Bu әzabları çәkmәyimin sәbәbi dә budur. Amma bundan utanmıram, çünki Kimә iman etdiyimi bilirәm vә әminәm ki, mәnә verdiyi әmanәti qiyamәt gününә qәdәr saxlamağa qadirdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Hold the pattern of sound words which you have heard from me, in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Mәsih İsada olan iman vә mәhәbbәtlә mәndәn eşitdiyin sağlam sözlәrdәn nümunә götür.

ReferenceBlocks.text: That good thing which was committed to you, guard through the Holy Spirit who dwells in us.

block.text: Sәnә verilәn yaxşı әmanәti bizdә yaşayan Müqәddәs Ruh vasitәsilә saxla.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This you know, that all who are in Asia turned away from me; of whom are Phygelus and Hermogenes.

block.text: Bilirsәn ki, Asiya vilayәtindә olanların hamısı mәndәn üz döndәrdilәr. Hәmçinin Figel vә Hermogen dә bunların sırasındadır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: May the Lord grant mercy to the house of Onesiphorus, for he often refreshed me, and was not ashamed of my chain.

block.text: Rәbb Onisiforun ev әhlinә mәrhәmәt etsin. Çünki dәfәlәrlә mәni ruhlandırdı, mәnim zәncirlәnmәyimdәn utanmadı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But when he was in Rome, he sought me diligently, and found me.

block.text: Әksinә, Romada olarkәn mәni sәylә axtarıb tapdı.

ReferenceBlocks.text: When the Lord comes again may he show mercy to him. You know what a help he was to me in Ephesus.

block.text: Qoy Rәbb qiyamәt günü ona mәrhәmәt tapmağa imkan versin. Efesdә onun mәnә nә qәdәr xidmәt etdiyini sәn çox yaxşı bilirsәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY CHP 2
You therefore, my child, be strengthened in the grace that is in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Sәnsә, ey oğlum, Mәsih İsada olan lütflә güclәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The things which you have heard from me among many witnesses, commit the same to faithful men, who will be able to teach others also.

block.text: Bir çox şahidlәrin önündә mәndәn eşitdiyin sözlәri başqalarına da öyrәtmәyә qadir olan sadiq adamlara hәvalә et.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You therefore must endure hardship, as a good soldier of Christ Jesus.

block.text: Mәsih İsanın yaxşı әsgәri kimi mәnimlә birgә әzaba qatlaş.

ReferenceBlocks.text: No soldier on duty entangles himself in the affairs of life, that he may please him who enrolled him as a soldier.

block.text: Әsgәrlik edәn insan gündәlik hәyatla bağlı işlәrә sürüklәnmәz, ona әmr edәn zabiti razı salmağa çalışar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Also, if anyone competes in athletics, he isn't crowned unless he has competed by the rules.

block.text: Hәmçinin yarışlara qoşulan insan da qaydaya görә yarışmazsa, başına zәfәr çәlәngi qoyulmaz.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The farmers who labor must be the first to get a share of the crops.

block.text: Zәhmәtkeş әkinçinin payına mәhsulunun ilk bәhrәsi düşmәlidir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Consider what I say, and may the Lord give you understanding in all things.

block.text: Dediklәrimә fikir ver. Rәbb söylәdiyim hәr şeydә sәnә anlayış verәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remember Jesus Christ, risen from the dead, of the seed of David, according to my Good News,

block.text: Yaydığım Müjdәdә açıqlandığı kimi, Davudun nәslindәn olub ölülәr arasından dirilәn İsa Mәsihi yadında saxla.

ReferenceBlocks.text: in which I suffer hardship to the point of chains as a criminal. But God's word isn't chained.

block.text: Bu Müjdә naminә zәncirә vurulmuş bir cinayәtkar kimi әzaba qatlaşıram. Amma Allahın kәlamı zәncirlәnmәmişdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Therefore I endure all things for the chosen ones’ sake, that they also may obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with eternal glory.

block.text: Bu sәbәbdәn seçilmişlәrә görә, onlar da Mәsih İsada olan xilasa әbәdi izzәtlә bәrabәr nail olsunlar deyә hәr şeyә dözürәm.

ReferenceBlocks.text: This saying is faithful: “For if we died with him, we will also live with him.

block.text: Bu söz etibarlıdır ki,<<Әgәr Onunla öldüksә, Onunla da yaşayacağıq;

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we endure, we will also reign with him. If we deny him, he also will deny us.

block.text: Әgәr dözәriksә, Onunla da birlikdә padşahlıq edәcәyik. Әgәr Onu inkar etsәk, O da bizi inkar edәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If we are faithless, he remains faithful. He can't deny himself.”

block.text: Biz sadiq qalmasaq da, O sadiq qalacaq. Çünki Öz tәbiәtinә zidd davrana bilmәz>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Remind them of these things, charging them in the sight of the Lord, that they don't argue about words. It is of no profit, subverting of those who hear.

block.text: Bunları imanlıların yadına sal. Sözlәrin mәnası barәdә dava etmәmәyi Allahın önündә onların öhdәsinә qoy; çünki bu fayda vermәz, dinlәyәnlәrә isә ziyan vurar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Study to present yourself approved by God, a workman who doesn't need to be ashamed, properly handling the Word of Truth.

block.text: Özünü Allaha sınaqdan keçmiş, hәqiqәt kәlamını doğruluqla işlәdәn alnıaçıq bir işçi kimi tәqdim etmәyә çalış.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But shun empty chatter, for it will go further in ungodliness.

block.text: Allahsız boşboğazlıqdan uzaq dur. Çünki belә boşboğazlıqlar insanı daha da allahsızlığa aparır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Their teaching will consume like gangrene. Hymenaeus and Philetus are like this.

block.text: Onların sözü irinli yara kimi yayılacaq. Himeney vә Filit onların sırasındadır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They have turned from the truth, saying that the resurrection is already past, and overthrowing the faith of some.

block.text: Onlar dirilmәnin artıq baş verdiyini deyәrәk hәqiqәtdәn azıb bәzilәrinin imanını alt-üst edirlәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: However God's firm foundation stands, having this seal, “The Lord knows those who are his,” and, “Let every one who names the name of the Lord depart from unrighteousness.”

block.text: Lakin Allahın atdığı möhkәm tәmәl bu sözlәrlә möhürlәnib durur: <<Rәbb Özününkülәri tanıyır>> vә <<Rәbbin adını ağzına alan hәr kәs haqsızlıqdan uzaqlaşsın>>.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Now in a large house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of clay. Some are for honor, and some for dishonor.

block.text: Böyük bir evdә yalnız qızıl vә gümüş qablar deyil, hәmçinin taxta vә gil qablar da var. Onlardan bәzisi şәrәfli, bәzisi dә şәrәfsiz iş üçün istifadә olunur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: If anyone therefore purges himself from these, he will be a vessel for honor, sanctified. A vessel suitable for the master's use, prepared for every good work.

block.text: Belәliklә, kim özünü şәrәfsiz işlәrdәn tәmizlәsә, şәrәfli işlәrә uyğun, tәqdis olunmuş, Sahibinә faydalı, hәr yaxşı iş üçün hazırlanmış qab olacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Flee from youthful lusts; but pursue righteousness, faith, love, and peace with those who call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

block.text: Gәnclik ehtiraslarından qaç. Tәmiz ürәklә Rәbbi çağıranlarla birlikdә salehliyin, imanın, mәhәbbәtin vә sülhün ardınca get.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But refuse foolish and ignorant questionings, knowing that they generate strife.

block.text: Axmaq vә cahil mübahisәlәrdәn uzaq ol. Çünki bunların dava-dalaşa sәbәb olmasını bilirsәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Lord's servant must not quarrel, but be gentle towards all, able to teach, and be patient.

block.text: Rәbbin qulu davakar olmamalıdır. Әksinә, hamı ilә mülayim rәftar etmәli, öyrәtmәyә qabil, sәbirli olmalıdır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: In gentleness he must correct those who oppose him: perhaps God may give them repentance leading to a full knowledge of the truth.

block.text: Ona qarşı olanları hәlimliklә tәrbiyә etmәlidir. Bәlkә Allah onlara tövbәyә imkan verәcәk. Belәliklә, onlar hәqiqәti anlayar,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Then they may recover themselves out of the devil's snare, having been taken captive by him to his will.

block.text: ayıq ola bilәrlәr vә istәyini yerinә yetirmәk üçün onları әsir edәn iblisin torundan çıxarlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY CHP 3
But know this, that in the last days, grievous times will come.

block.text: Bunu bil ki, bu axır zamanda çәtin dövrlәr olacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For men will be lovers of self, lovers of money, boastful, arrogant, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,

block.text: Çünki insanlar xudbin, pulpәrәst, tәkәbbürlü, mәğrur, tәhqir edәn, valideynlәrinә itaәt etmәyәn, nankor, müqәddәslikdәn mәhrum,

ReferenceBlocks.text: without natural affection, unforgiving, slanderers, without self-control, fierce, no lovers of those that are good,

block.text: şәfqәtsiz, barışmaz, böhtançı, nәfsini saxlamayan, rәhmsiz, yaxşılığın düşmәni,

ReferenceBlocks.text: traitors, headstrong, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God;

block.text: xain, ehtiyatsız, qürurlu olacaq, Allahdan çox kef çәkmәyi sevәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: holding a form of godliness, but having denied its power. Turn away from these, also.

block.text: Mömin kimi görünüb bu yolun gücünü inkar edәcәklәr. Bu cür adamlardan uzaq dur.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For some of these are people who creep into houses, and take captive gullible women loaded down with sins, led away by various lusts.

block.text: Bunların arasında evlәrә soxulub zәif iradәli qadınları әsir edәn adamlar var. Belә qadınlar günahla yüklәnmiş müxtәlif ehtiraslarla sövq edilir,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Such women are always learning, but never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.

block.text: daima öyrәnir, amma hәqiqәti heç zaman anlaya bilmirlәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Even as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses, so do these also oppose the truth; men corrupted in mind, who concerning the faith, are rejected.

block.text: Yannis vә Yambris Musaya necә zidd getdilәrsә, bu adamlar da elәcә hәqiqәtә zidd gedirlәr. Onlar düşüncәlәri pozğun, imanları sınaqdan keçmәmiş insanlardır.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But they will proceed no further. For their folly will be evident to all men, as theirs also came to be.

block.text: Amma daha irәli gedә bilmәyәcәklәr. Çünki Yannislә Yambrisin axmaqlığı kimi bunların da axmaqlığını hamı açıqca görәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you however know all about my teaching, conduct, purpose, faith, patience, love, steadfastness,

block.text: Sәnsә mәnim tәlimimi, davranışımı, mәqsәdimi, imanımı, sәbrimi, mәhәbbәtimi, dözümümü,

ReferenceBlocks.text: persecutions, and sufferings: those things that happened to me at Antioch, Iconium, and Lystra. I endured those persecutions. Out of them all the Lord delivered me.

block.text: Antakyada, Konyada, Listrada başıma gәlәn tәqiblәri, çәkdiyim әzabları diqqәtlә izlәdin. Nә cür tәqiblәrә qatlandım! Amma Rәbb mәni bunların hamısından xilas etdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Yes, and all who desire to live godly in Christ Jesus will suffer persecution.

block.text: Mәsih İsada möminliyә yaraşan bir hәyat sürmәk istәyәnlәrin hamısı tәqibә mәruz qalacaq.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But evil men and impostors will grow worse and worse, deceiving and being deceived.

block.text: Amma pis adamlar vә saxtakarlar aldadıb-aldanaraq getdikcә daha betәr olacaqlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you remain in the things which you have learned and have been assured of, knowing from whom you have learned them.

block.text: Sәnsә öyrәndiyin vә güvәndiyin şeylәrә sadiq qal. Çünki bunları kimlәrdәn öyrәndiyini bilirsәn,

ReferenceBlocks.text: From infancy, you have known the holy Scriptures which are able to make you wise for salvation through faith, which is in Christ Jesus.

block.text: Müqәddәs Yazıları uşaqlıqdan bәri tanıdığını da bilirsәn. Onlar Mәsih İsaya olan iman vasitәsilә sәnә xilas gәtirәn hikmәt vermәyә qadirdir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Every Scripture is God-breathed and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for instruction in righteousness.

block.text: Bütün Müqәddәs Yazılar Allahdan ilham almış vә tәlim, mәzәmmәt, islah, salehlik tәrbiyәsi üçün faydalıdır;

ReferenceBlocks.text: It gives the man of God everything he needs so that he will be complete, thoroughly equipped for every good work.

block.text: belәcә Allah adamı bacarıqlı olub hәr yaxşı iş üçün tәchiz edilsin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: 2 TIMOTHY CHP 4
I command you therefore before God and the Lord Jesus Christ, who will judge the living and the dead at his appearing and his Kingdom:

block.text: Allahın vә dirilәrlә ölülәri mühakimә edәcәk Mәsih İsanın önündә Onun zühuru vә Padşahlığının haqqı üçün sәnә buyururam ki,

ReferenceBlocks.text: Preach the word; be urgent in season and out of season; reprove, rebuke, and exhort, with all patience and teaching.

block.text: Allahın kәlamını vәz edәsәn, hansı vaxt olursa-olsun hazır olasan, insanlara tam sәbirlә tәlim öyrәdәrәk mәzәmmәt, xәbәrdarlıq vә nәsihәt verәsәn.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For the time will come when they will not listen to the sound doctrine. Having itching ears, will heap up for themselves teachers after their own lusts.

block.text: Çünki elә bir zaman gәlәcәk ki, sağlam tәlimә dözmәyәcәklәr. Qulaq oxşayan sözlәr eşitmәk üçün әtraflarına öz ehtiraslarına uyğun müәllimlәr toplayacaqlar.

ReferenceBlocks.text: They will turn away their ears from the truth, and turn aside to fables.

block.text: Qulaqlarını hәqiqәtdәn döndәrәcәk, әfsanәlәrә meyl göstәrәcәklәr.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But you be sober in all things, suffer hardship, do the work of an evangelist, and fulfill your ministry.

block.text: Amma sәn hәr vәziyyәtdә ayıq ol. Әzaba qatlaş, müjdәçilik işini yerinә yetir, öz xidmәtinә tam әmәl et.

ReferenceBlocks.text: For I am already being offered, and the time of my departure has come.

block.text: Çünki qanım artıq içmә tәqdimi kimi tökülmәk üzrәdir. Artıq ayrılma zamanım gәldi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: I have fought the good fight. I have finished the course. I have kept the faith.

block.text: Mәn yaxşı mübarizә aparmışam, yolumu sona çatdırdım, imanı saxladım.

ReferenceBlocks.text: From now on, there is stored up for me the crown of righteousness, which the Lord, the righteous judge, will give to me on that day; and not to me only, but also to all those who have loved his appearing.

block.text: İndi salehlik tacı mәnim üçün hazır durur. Әdalәtli Hakim olan Rәbb qiyamәt günü onu mәnә – yalnız mәnә deyil, Onun zühuruna can atanların hamısına verәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be diligent to come to me soon,

block.text: Yanıma tez gәlmәyә çalış.

ReferenceBlocks.text: for Demas left me, having loved this present world, and went to Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia, and Titus to Dalmatia.

block.text: Çünki Dima indiki dövrü sevdiyi üçün mәni tәrk edib Salonikә getdi. Kreskent Qalatiyaya, Tit isә Dalmatiyaya getdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Only Luke is with me. Take Mark, and bring him with you, for he is useful to me for service.

block.text: Yalnız Luka yanımdadır. Markı da götür özünlә gәtir, çünki o etdiyim xidmәtdә mәnә yardım edir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But I sent Tychicus to Ephesus.

block.text: Tixiki isә Efesә göndәrdim.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Bring the cloak that I left at Troas with Carpus when you come, and the books, especially the parchments.

block.text: Troasda Karpın yanında qoyduğum yapıncını, kitabları, xüsusәn, yazılı dәrilәri dә gәlәndә gәtir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Alexander, the coppersmith, did much evil to me. The Lord will repay him according to his works.

block.text: Misgәr İsgәndәr mәnә çox pislik etdi. Rәbb ona әmәllәrinin әvәzini verәcәk.

ReferenceBlocks.text: You also must beware of him; for he greatly opposed our words.

block.text: Sәn dә ondan özünü gözlә. Çünki söylәdiklәrimizә ciddi-cәhdlә zidd getdi.

ReferenceBlocks.text: At my first defense, no one came to help me, but all left me. May it not be held against them.

block.text: Mәn ilk dәfә müdafiә olunanda heç kim mәnә tәrәfdar çıxmadı, hamı mәni tәrk etdi. Qoy onlara günah sayılmasın.

ReferenceBlocks.text: But the Lord stood by me, and strengthened me, that through me the message might be fully proclaimed, and that all the Gentiles might hear; and I was delivered out of the mouth of the lion.

block.text: Lakin Rәbb kömәyimә gәlib mәnә güc verdi ki, vәz mәnim vasitәmlә tam elan edilsin vә onu bütün millәtlәr eşitsin. Mәn aslanın ağzından xilas oldum.

ReferenceBlocks.text: And the Lord will deliver me from every evil work, and will preserve me for his heavenly Kingdom; to whom be the glory forever and ever. Amen.

block.text: Rәbb mәni hәr cür pis әmәldәn qurtaracaq vә Öz Sәmavi Padşahlığı üçün xilas edәcәk. Ona әbәdi olaraq izzәt olsun! Amin.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Greet Prisca and Aquila, and the house of Onesiphorus.

block.text: Priskila ilә Akilaya vә Onisiforun ev әhlinә salam söylә.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Erastus remained at Corinth, but I left Trophimus at Miletus sick.

block.text: Erast Korinfdә qaldı. Trofimi isә xәstә halda Miletdә qoydum.

ReferenceBlocks.text: Be diligent to come before winter. Eubulus salutes you, as do Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the brothers.

block.text: Çalış ki, qışdan әvvәl gәlәsәn. Evvul, Pudent, Lin, Klavdiya vә bütün bacı-qardaşlar sәnә salam göndәrir.

ReferenceBlocks.text: The Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Grace be with you. Amen.

block.text: Rәbb sәnin ruhuna yar olsun! Sizә lütf olsun!
